Class PerishableUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • pvz.Unit
        • pvz.PerishableUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Plant, Zombie

    public abstract class PerishableUnit
extends Unit
    Author:
    Arzaan Irani 100826631 This class models units have a reduceable amount of HP which can die after their HP reaches 0.

      • reduceHP

        public void reduceHP(int amount)
        Reduces unit's current hp by amount. If the unit's current hp becomes zero or less, the unit dies.
        Parameters:
        amount - Number to reduce current HP by
